content: How much do I owe in taxes?

Tax rate,Taxable income threshold
2.46%, on the portion of taxable income that is $4030 or less, plus
3.51%, on the portion of taxable income over $4030 up to $24120 plus
5.01%, on the portion of taxable income over $24120 up to $38870 plus
5.20%, on the portion of taxable income over $38870
